issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h2. Feature description
Currently, only one at a time can be added using insertRowBefore or insertRowAfter in a TableView; it would be useful to have a way to add multiple rows in a single call, in order to avoid the latency due to the one-by-one insert.
fields.summary: Allow multiple rows to be added with insertRowBefore and insertRowAfter
